text:
Snoop Dogg is probably one of the 
most memorable rappers out there

and has been making music and 
movies since the early 90's.

So in the first part of today's lesson 
we're going to cover a fragment of his first

solo single "Who Am I, What's My Name?" and 
then we'll take a look at some of his big hits

from the 90's and also more recent ones.
Are you ready? Let's jump straight in!

By the way, in case you're new here, we help 
you to learn fast English without getting lost,

without missing the jokes and without subtitles.
Just like this fan, who says that not only

has he improved his fluency but 
he now understands British and

American accents thanks to our channel.
So don't forget to hit that Subscribe

button and the Bell down below, so that 
you don't miss any of our new lessons!

Do you struggle to understand 
fast speaking natives?

Then I highly recommend our 
Fluent with Friends Course.

In this 48-week course you will learn 
with the first two seasons of Friends.

You'll receive PDF power lessons every week, 
vocabulary memorization software, access to our

Fluency Circle Global Community and so much more.
And the best part is you can try it right

now for FREE with our 3-Part Masterclass.
All you have to do is click up here or down

in the description box below to learn more and 
sign up now. We look forward to seeing you there!

If you enjoy learning English with songs then 
I highly recommend you check out this playlist.

You'll find a great variety of artists 
to choose from and you can click up

here or down in the description box 
below to choose your next lesson.
